name.japanese: イヌイヌの実 モデル:ウルフ
name.romanized: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Urufu

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a wolf or a human-wolf hybrid resembling a werewolf. This transformation dramatically amplifies the user's physical capabilities, speed, and combat power.

abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into a full wolf or human-wolf hybrid, greatly enhancing physical strength, speed, and senses.
In combination with Rokushiki techniques, the wolf form's enhanced physical capabilities make Tekkai Kenpo even more formidable.

trivia.fact: Jabra's wolf form combined with his Tekkai Kenpo made him a formidable opponent, but was ultimately overcome by Sanji's Diable Jambe.
